column4: hi, anyone know where to get Acer 7720Z laptop wireless drivers, im bored of this network cable ^^
oh, forgot to add the ?
how?
that will tell you the wireless chip
run lspci
its a terminal command
once you know the wireless chip (i'llbet money its a broadcom with it being an acer) you can look into how to get it installed
its what you know that counts
format the partition would be my guess, it will remove ALL data on the partition so copy out anything you want beforehand
: will it harm the grub?
run: gksudo gparted
you can format it there and then use it as data storage or whatever you wish
does it all show in: sudo fdisk -l
it still shows only sda1 and sda2 there :o ?
then im guessing your other partitions arenet seen. Im guessing those are your / and /swp
boot to xp cd and reinstall the boot sector, the guys in ##windows will advise well
thanks, I will ask them. But what do you mean exactly, reinstalling the boot sector?
you need to run the fixmbr and fixboot command
you need an XP cd to reinstall the boot sector, its a windows issue though
i think vlc plays it, mplayer can with codecs (afaik)
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1013896
